ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Survey activities undertaken to ensure and validate that all works meet level and location requirements. The establishment and integrity of the survey network shall be verified before commencing any survey and setout activity. IFC and latest available revision used

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: In situ material ripped and re-compacted to provide a smooth, stable working surface. Material to be free of debris, roots, sticks and sharp rocks/ boulders larger than 50mm
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Project Spec. Latest IFC Drawings
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
FREQUENCY: Prior to placement of Type A

FREQUENCY: Once GCL has been installed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: A minimum 300mm thick Type A fill layer shall be placed over the Bentofix GCL that has been installed

FREQUENCY: Once Type A fill layer has been installed

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Provide a compacted 400mm thick hard base. Approximately 50% 300mm size. The remaining 50% made up of 0-100mm graded rock, premixed with 300 dia rocks and spread and tracked so as to form a compated base.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Project Spec. Latest IFC Drawings
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP Signed Off
